function.name: get
function.description: Returns the element at the specified position in this list.

function.name: isEmpty
function.description: Returns true if this list contains no elements.

function.name: size
function.description: Returns the number of elements in this list.

function.name: removeAll
function.description: Removes from this list all the elements that are contained in the specified collection.

function.name: retainAll
function.description: Retains only the elements in this list that are contained in the specified collection.

function.name: index
function.description: Given an Object, and an index, returns the nth value in the object.

function.name: subtract
function.description: Returns a new collection containing a - b.

function.name: union
function.description: Returns a collection containing the union of the given collections.

function.name: intersection
function.description: Returns a collection containing the intersection of the given collections.

function.name: containsAny
function.description: Returns a collection containing the intersection of the given collections.

function.name: isFull
function.description: Returns true if no more elements can be added to the Collection.

function.name: isNotEmpty
function.description: Null-safe check if the specified collection is not empty.

function.name: disjunction
function.description: Returns a collection containing the exclusive disjunction of the given collections.

function.name: isSubCollection
function.description: Returns true iff a is a sub-collection of b, that is, iff the cardinality of e in a is less than or equal to the cardinality of e in b, for each element e in a.

function.name: isProperSubCollection
function.description: Returns true iff a is a proper sub-collection of b, that is, iff the cardinality of e in a is less than or equal to the cardinality of e in b, for each element e in a, and there is at least one element f such that the cardinality of f in b is strictly greater than the cardinality of f in a.

function.name: isEqualCollection
function.description: Returns true iff the given {@link Collection}s contain exactly the same elements with exactly the same cardinalities.

function.name: addIgnoreNull
function.description: Adds an element to the collection unless the element is null.

function.name: sizeIsEmpty
function.description: Checks if the specified collection/array/iterator is empty.

function.name: reverseArray
function.description: Reverses the order of the given array.

function.name: typedCollection
function.description: Returns a typed collection backed by the given collection.
